mapper.select: select count(*) from comm_comment where comm_num=#{comm_num}
select * from comm_comment where comm_num= #{comm_num} order by comm_comm_date asc, comm_comm_num asc
mapper.delete: delete from comm_comment where comm_comm_num= #{comm_comm_num} and comm_comm_writer= #{comm_comm_writer}
mapper.sql: select comm_num, comm_comm_num, comm_comm_content, comm_comm_writer, comm_comm_date from comm_comment
mapper.select: order by comm_comm_date desc, comm_comm_num desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
